title: murugap-perumAn tirunAmam tannai
sahitya:
murugap-perumAn tirunAmam tannai karudinAl gati peralAm manamE


anupallavi

  tiruvEragham tEDi vandE tannai darishittiDuvOrai paripAlittiDum


caraNam    paramAnanda sukham uravE bhaktarukku parivODaruL purindu varuvOn
siridEnum undan cintai kuvindu nI murugA murugAvena urugik-karaindE
